description:
Provides a DMS (Data Migration Service) certificate resource. DMS certificates can be created, deleted, and imported.

~> **Note:** All arguments including the PEM encoded certificate will be stored in the raw state as plain-text.
[Read more about sensitive data in state](/docs/state/sensitive-data.html).

tfcfnid.description: Internal identifier for tracking resource changes. Do not use.

CertificatePem.description: The contents of the .pem X.509 certificate file for the certificate. Either `certificate_pem` or `certificate_wallet` must be set.

CertificateWallet.description: The contents of the Oracle Wallet certificate for use with SSL. Either `certificate_pem` or `certificate_wallet` must be set.
